name: Kobold's ordinary gem journey
description:
In this  game you play as a kobold thats doing his best. You can explore the caverns, talk to other kobolds, find treasure, go fishing, fall in love,  bother baddies or get bodied by the baddies. 

Some interactions will hurt you and in order to check your health, you need to find small water puddles and interact with them. To gain your health back, just go find a bed and go to sleep. You may have weird dreams in the process but don't worry about them, they are not real.

The game was made in the Bitsy game maker.

Also the game contains not so family friendly language here and there.
